--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire/Stratus::
> 
> "The great Hovotron, eh?" Autofire says, calmly approaching the 
group of D.E.D bots, not even glancing as Firestrike's body flew by, 
all weapons trailed on the enemies. "You don't seem so great from 
where I'm standing."


::Domnijoe::

    Domnijoe stood ready like an elastic band ready to spring. Her 
wrist launcher was  armed but she did not aim it on the invading 
Decepticons. Megatron firmly said for her not to engage in combat. She 
would leave that to the others.
    "Slow 'em down...' she mumbled to herself. 'How do I slow 'em 
down...' She listened to Havotron's speech with wry amusement and 
snickered when he ordered the Constructicons to Transform. She could 
see their uncertainty.
    "He bluffs!" she yelled. 'They don't want to obey orders!"


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
************************
